title: Builder Potion
summaries: The Builder Potion is a buff potion which grants the Builder buff upon consumption. The buff increases tile and wall placement speed by 25% and extends placement range by one tile. This lasts for (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 45 / (Old-gen console version) 15 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon using Cycle Next/Previous Buff and then pressing Remove Buff ([img:Console version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Old-gen console version]), or by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]).
